name: Drifting Ashes
description:
BIG OOPSIE! The controls in the tutorial level are broken. The other levels work fine. Sorry for the inconvenience

Control-

Wasd to move

Mouse to aim

L-Click to shoot

Space To dash

Note:The game is unpolished, unfinished, and buggy, but after all that work, I at least wanted to have something to submit.
